did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of photocopies and some originals of birth, marriage, death and other family information recorded in family Bibles. Some files include correspondence related to the donation. The collection also contains an index to similar Bible records held by The Historical Society of Pennsylvania and some correspondence related to valuation of Bibles.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
